name: Sharpy wheel
description: Wooow. It was veeeeery hard. From idea to publishing there were problems everywhere, even with art. I can't draw normaly so this art is kinda bad..? Anyway, it was fun and thats all that matter now. Also some of u will have promblems with music and idk how to fix it, so all i can is just say "Sorry". Ok, problably thats all abouy my 'Game', good luck and have fun playing.!
